rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
There's a limit to the number of Blades
you can have in your team.

rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Makes sense, since there's only
so many you can go traveling with
at once.

rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It's sad, but saying goodbye's
an inevitable part of life...

rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But when the time comes, they'll be
sure to leave you a parting gift.

rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0005
rows.name:
It just shows you that they're thinking
of their Driver till the very end...

rows.label: tlk43700141_02_msg0006
rows.name:
You'll have to make good use of the
gifts!
